title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 174.10 - New york state stopped stickers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 174.10 - New york state stopped stickers

State Regulations

One sticker may be displayed on the inside of the front
windshield, in the upper left hand corner on those motor vehicles registered in
the New York State STOPPED Program. Such stickers must be transparent with a
red border and must be no larger than 31/2 inches wide by 31/2inches
high. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
174.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
